TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 表示分层数据绑定控件（如 ）可以绑定到的分层数据源。

span.span: Represents a hierarchical data source that hierarchical data-bound controls such as can bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持的控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够绑定到数据并以一致的方式呈现数据。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 将绑定到数据的 web 服务器控件调用数据绑定控件，并帮助绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任何数据源： 文件、 流、 关系数据库、 业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件数据绑定控件，而不考虑源或基础数据的格式一致的方式呈现数据。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 表示分层数据的数据源控件派生自类，该类是基本的 ASP.NET 实现的接口。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the class, which is the base ASP.NET implementation of the interface. 接口是用于定义数据源控件公开分层数据，而不是表格或列表型数据，到 Web 服务器控件派生自类，如控件。The interface is used to define data source controls that expose hierarchical data, rather than tabular or list-style data, to Web server controls that derive from the class, such as the control. 该接口定义单个方法，检索强类型化对象。The interface defines a single method, , which retrieves a strongly typed object. 实现此接口的数据源控件支持它们所表示的数据的每个层次结构级别的层次结构视图。Data source controls that implement this interface support a hierarchical view for each hierarchical level of data they represent. 数据源视图未命名，如对象，但由其唯一的分层路径，即标识`viewPath`参数传递给方法。The data source views are not named, like objects, but are identified by their unique hierarchical path, which is the `viewPath` parameter passed to the method. 您可以将数据源控件的组合视为对象，并对基础数据及其关联的视图。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated views on the underlying data. 每个关联对象定义的层次结构级别表示，数据源控件的功能，并所有 ASP.NET 数据源视图对象，如执行 insert、 update、 delete 和排序等操作。Each associated object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and, like all ASP.NET data source view objects, performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort. 数据源控件只公开分层数据，如，派生自类。Data source controls that expose only hierarchical data, such as , are derived from the class. 其他数据源控件将其数据公开为层次结构数据和表格数据，如，派生自实现，但和接口。Other data source controls that expose their data as both hierarchical data and tabular data, such as , are derived from but implement the and interfaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展抽象类，该类实现接口，以创建显示文件系统信息的数据源控件。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract class, which implements the interface, to create a data source control that displays file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`类提供的实现方法，检索指定的文件系统路径的强类型化的视图对象。The `FileSystemDataSource` class provides an implementation of the method, which retrieves a strongly typed view object for a specified file system path. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 接口表示的数据存储已更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the data storage that the interface represents has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改数据源控件的属性，如更改时引发事件属性的控件，或更改基础数据存储，会发生更改的 XML 节点中的数据通过执行编辑操作控件。The event is raised when a change is made to the data source control's properties, such as changing the property of an control, or changing the data in the underlying data storage, which happens when XML nodes are changed by an edit action performed by an control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView GetHierarchicalView(string viewPath) cil managed
Public Function GetHierarchicalView (viewPath As String) As HierarchicalDataSourceView

param.name: viewPath
param.span: 要检索的视图的分层路径。

span.span: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.

summary.span: 获取指定路径的 接口的视图帮助器对象。

span.span: Gets the view helper object for the interface for the specified path.

returns.span: 返回一个 ，代表由 参数所标识的分层级别上的数据的单个视图。

span.span: Returns a that represents a single view of the data at the hierarchical level identified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口，如接口中，定义层次结构数据源控件用来检索数据源视图的方法。The interface, like the interface, defines a method that hierarchical data source controls use to retrieve a data source view. 像所有与数据源控件相关联的帮助程序对象对象用于定义数据源可以使用基础数据执行的操作。Like all helper objects that are associated with data source controls, a object defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data. 但是，尽管通常表示表格数据的数据源控件具有只有一个命名的视图，但分层数据源控件支持每个级别的数据源控件表示的分层数据视图。However, although data source controls that represent tabular data typically have only one named view, hierarchical data source controls support a view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents. 分层数据的级别由唯一的分层路径，作为传递`viewPath`参数。The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed as the `viewPath` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的类来扩展方法类用于检索强类型化对象唯一的分层路径。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class to retrieve a strongly typed object for a unique hierarchical path. `FileSystemDataSource`类的实现检索`FileSystemDataSourceView`指定的文件系统路径的对象。The `FileSystemDataSource` class's implementation of retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object for a specified file system path. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]
